channel.title: Give other player lvls
channel.description:
Question: I was wondering if there was a way to make a command that my admins can use to give another player lvls Situation: For the Crystal Bow you need 50 agility, I want to make it so you have to register on forums for 50 agility, so i want to be able for my admisn to do something like ::giveagility bob, so that it will give bob 50 agility
If any1 knows how to do this please post here. Thx ;D!!!!

item.title: Give other player lvls
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“2h slapped, post:8, topic:241587”]no need to flame everyone.
HE KNOWS HOW TO CHANGE XP THROUGH COMMANDS AND FILES
but what he wants to know is if admins can change OTHER player stats without having to give them mod/admin, which beats the whole purpouse.

what you can try is searching for it in client.java because i believe i saw a command like that…
gl,

2h slapped[/quote]

That’s why you just make the command have like ::addxp [playername] [skillid] [xp]

Then playerTwo get the index from the name. And the playerTwo.addSkillXP();

Or whatever your server has for its variables.

Use common sense.

Read full topic

no need to flame everyone.
HE KNOWS HOW TO CHANGE XP THROUGH COMMANDS AND FILES
but what he wants to know is if admins can change OTHER player stats without having to give them mod/admin, which beats the whole purpouse.

what you can try is searching for it in client.java because i believe i saw a command like that…

item.title: Give other player lvls
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:6, topic:241587”][quote author=PenG™ link=topic=317943.msg2522750#msg2522750 date=1226010287]
No you cant, you have to go to character files and change their level + experience. Unless you give them administrator temporary. and tell them to do ::addxp (skillid) (experience)
[/quote]

Dumbass not all sources have that and yes you can make a command to give them a specific level dumbshit…you can basically do anything if your not a dumbass.[/quote]

I second that.

If an administrator can add xp… why not a mod? Just make the playerRights lower.

Stop being retarded people.

Read full topic

item.title: Give other player lvls
item.dc:creator: @PenG PenG™
item.description:
@PenG wrote:

No you cant, you have to go to character files and change their level + experience. Unless you give them administrator temporary. and tell them to do ::addxp (skillid) (experience)

Read full topic
